sentences.sentence: And shortly afterwards, horrific welts started to spring up all over his body.
sentences.translation: 此后不久，可怕的伤痕开始涌现在他的身上所有。

sentences.sentence: Moisture welts: Wrinkles in a paper roll caused by moisture absorption after drying.
sentences.translation: 水痕：纸卷在干燥后吸收水份而起皱的情况。

sentences.sentence: When he is finished the German has these huge welts on his back, and he can hardly move.
sentences.translation: 当德国人挨完打，他的背上有一条条大大的伤痕，并且几乎不能动弹了。
